title: 服务端同时2人在线就崩溃，请问怎么回事？
author: 四处游荡的风
txt_content:
本帖最后由 四处游荡的风 于 2014-5-30 16:35 编辑 

开的服务器，一个人在线就没问题。再一个人登录就服务器直接崩溃。

崩溃信息
[16:33:24] [Netty IO #0/INFO] [FML]: Client protocol version 1
[16:33:24] [Netty IO #0/INFO] [FML]: Client attempting to join with 13 mods : craftguide@1.5.2,realisticpain@1.0,LightBridgesAndDoors@0.1.9,mcp@8.09,FML@7.2.129.1046,zeldaswordskills@1.7.2-0.2.0,BambooMod@Minecraft1.7.2 ver2.6.4.8,reiminimap@1.7.2-1.0,Forge@10.12.0.1046,inventorytweaks@1.57-dev-110,TooManyItems@1.7.2[hukk汉化],craftSaddle@1.72.0.3,InputFix@1.7.x-v2
[16:33:24] [Netty IO #0/INFO] [FML]: Attempting connection with missing mods [] at CLIENT
[16:33:25] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: [Server thread] Server side modded connection established
[16:33:25] [Server thread/INFO]: Shanker[/192.168.1.105:53809] logged in with entity id 781 at ([world] 15.037105709379636, 56.200000047683744, 57.69999998807907)
[16:33:25] [Server thread/ERROR]: Encountered an unexpected exception
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1
        at java.util.ArrayList.elementData(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.7.0_55]
        at java.util.ArrayList.get(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.7.0_55]
        at net.minecraft.server.management.ServerConfigurationManager.func_72374_b(ServerConfigurationManager.java:1280) ~[ld.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:971) ~[MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:419) ~[lj.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:797) ~[MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:661) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.7.0_55]
[16:33:25] [Server thread/ERROR]: This crash report has been saved to: C:\Users\哲\Desktop\游戏\MC\1.7.2\.\crash-reports\crash-2014-05-30_16.33.25-server.txt

replies.author: 兔斯基oo
replies.txt_content:
第一眼就看出了楼主是172的mcpc服
修复jar下载链接是
1.7.2版官方修复版下载：
http://ci.md-5.net/job/MCPC-Plus ... e1033-installer.jar
求楼主设最佳，希望能帮到楼主

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
这个是bug；
去下修复版；

replies.author: 四处游荡的风
replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-5-30 17:14
这个是bug；
去下修复版；
修复版在哪呢····
为啥有BUG还放下载链接{:10_566:}
一个人鼓捣两天了···

replies.author: 星环弹星者
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-255905-1-1.html
是因为mcpc+本身的问题=-=来这个贴下载修复版吧！
